meanings.definition: The act of making something shorter.
meanings.sent1: I used some shortenings to make the story easier to understand.
meanings.sent2: The shortenings of the movie made it more enjoyable to watch.
meanings.sent3: The shortenings of the line at the store caused confusion among the customers.
meanings.sent4: Her shortenings of the speech left out important details.
meanings.sent5: The shortenings of the rope made it safer to climb.

meanings.definition: Fats or oils used in baking to make pastries flaky.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for shortenings to make the cookies crispy.
meanings.sent2: She added shortenings to the dough to enhance the flavor of the bread.
meanings.sent3: The shortenings in the cake gave it a rich and buttery taste.
meanings.sent4: The chef's secret to perfect pie crusts was using shortenings.
meanings.sent5: The shortenings in the pastry created a delicious flakiness.
